name: Brickety Split
description:
Build the tallest wall you can by avoiding bricks as they fall from the sky! Brickety Split is a game about staying out of nature's way while it does all the work.

Features

  • A lovably naive hero named Rick!
  • Bricks!
  • Radical redefinition of the phrase "wall jumping"
  • Bricks!
  • Lots of friends to keep you company
  • Even the clouds are made of bricks!
  • An intuitive tutorial: just hit play and don't even worry about learning how

Keyboard Controls

  • Move with arrow keys.
  • Jump with Z, Space, Shift, Control, or Up Arrow.
  • Press M to mute the sounds.
  • If you experience any lag while playing, try disabling particle effects in the Options menu.
